BasicInfo.short: ZURB helps companies design better websites, services and products through services that include design strategy and interaction design.

Products.name: Notable
Products.description: Notable is an application that enables its users to provide feedback on websites and iPhone applications.

Products.name: Solidify
Products.description: Solidify is an online platform that enables users to build prototype interface screens with sketches, wireframes, and mockups.

Products.name: Solidify
Products.description: Solidify was added to CrunchBase in 2012

Products.name: Verify
Products.description: Verify is an online platform that enables users to test screenshots of their design work before coding takes place.

Products.name: Clue
Products.description: Clue is a way to test what people remember on website.

Products.name: Bounce
Products.description: Bounce is an application that enables its users to quickly add feedback to any webpage and share them with other people.
